dc_description_s: Operating power plants in Afghanistan as in 2016. Digitization based on Afghan Energy Information Center (AEIC) maps. The World Bank and the International Finance Corporation, collectively the World Bank Group (WBG) strives to enhance public access to and use of data that can support development impact.
